title.narrative: Improved food security, livelihoods and resilience for vulnerable target populations in Northern Bahr el Ghazal, South Sudan

description.narrative: Overall Objective: Empower returnees, IDPs and vulnerable populations to improve food security, enhance livelihoods and increase their resilience to disasters. Specific Objective: To improve the food, nutrition and income security of returnees, IDPs and vulnerable host populations in Aweil Centre, Aweil North and Aweil West, Northern Bahr el Ghazal and reduce their vulnerability to malnutrition, shocks and hazards.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to South Sudan

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to South Sudan

description.narrative: Aweil Centre, Aweil North and Aweil West, Northern Bahr el Ghazal, South Sudan

title.narrative: Number of targeted beneficiaries (returnees, Internally Displaced Persons and vulnerable host populations in a number of areas) who are members of marketing groups

title.narrative: Number of targeted beneficiaries (returnees, Internally Displaced Persons and vulnerable host populations in a number of areas) who are members of marketing groups

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
